Name: Nintendo Zapper
Description:
Used to play Duck Hunt... now, used to kill Sosigs.

Model from yogensia, on SketchFab.
Originally from Nintendo, of course.

------------------------------------

Used Compound Pistol as a base.
No magazine needed.
6 Mounts possible;

- Suppressor Mount (Muzzle)
- Bottom of the Barrel Mount
- Left and Right Side of the Barrel (On the Gray parts)
- Top (After the Slide, before the Barrel. The Wavy gray part)
- Stock (At the back of the Handle, on the Bottom part of it)

Have Fun!
